snippet: The deal will make the publishers’ backlist books available to monthly subscribers in a Netflix-style service.
abstract: HarperCollins announces deal to make its backlist books available on e-book subscription service through Scribd, Web site for sharing documents and books.
lead_paragraph: The deal will make the publishers’ backlist books available to monthly subscribers in a Netflix-style service.

headline.main: HarperCollins Joins Scribd in E-Book Subscription Plan
headline.print_headline: HarperCollins Joins Scribd In E-Book Subscription Plan
